jobs.title: Work experience
jobs.description_sngular: Frontend developer for a project in BBVA using as main technology Vue.js and Firebase, using as platform Google Cloud Platform.
jobs.description_ingeniova: As the company's main Frontend developer, I was in charge of the design, accessibility and usability of the web applications with the Angular 2/4 framework, always analysing and studying the client's requirements, applying clean code and good practices. I have also worked punctually with the Backend part in some applications, using Node.js and Microservices. In addition, I have also been responsible for the management of all the corporate websites of the main client, websites developed with Orchard, PHP and JavaScript Vanila.
jobs.description_wellness: My role in this company IoT has been that of developer of security products and services, especially of the information gathering stage. I have implemented collectors to check network security following the controls defined in the OWISAM security methodology with the Python programming language and I have also created a user interface for an iCirrus application (an EU Horizon 2020 project) with the Meteor.js. javascript framework
jobs.description_sopra: I have been involved in tasks related to Quality Assurance based on the v3 Methodology and testing processes since the early cycles of application development, ensuring quality, homogeneity and predictability

about_me.title: A little about me
about_me.question1_description: I've always liked technology, and I've always been curious to know how things work (a computer, a program, the internet, etc.). Also, I was always attracted to the idea of creating something that people could use and be of help to them. That's why I decided to become a Computer Engineer and dedicate myself to programming
about_me.question2_title: What do I do and what would I like to do?
about_me.question2_description: Right now I'm focusing on learning new skills and developing my own applications, although in the short term I'd like to have a more responsible position. I think that in the end your professional profile should evolve in responsibilities. Apart from programming, I would like to manage and plan the work of a team to meet the objectives of a project.
